title: Commercial Vacancy Tax - San Francisco
description:
A. SUMMARY This dataset delineates parcels with “Taxable Commercial Space” - meaning parcels where one or more property owner(s) and/or commercial tenant(s) are required to file or pay the Commercial Vacancy Tax. The dataset includes the Block, Lot, Parcel Number and Situs Address for each commercial parcel within the named Districts. Information about each filing received for the parcel is included, such as Filer Type (Owner / Tenant), Filer Name, and Situs Address from the Filing. The dataset also includes whether a parcel is vacant , and if so, the tax rate applied. Parcels marked as vacant either reported as vacant in the tax filing or were determined to be vacant by the Tax Collector. All information displayed is subject to audit by the Tax Collector. Filings that are reflected as Pending are under review by the Tax Collector. Reasons for review include: the filer reported that the parcel is not Taxable Commercial Space (i.e the parcel does not have a structure, is not within the boundaries, does not otherwise meet the definition of Taxable Commercial Space), or the Parcel Number and Situs Addresses are not aligned. If you are a taxpayer and need to update the information displayed, you should re-file https://sftreasurer.org/business/taxes-fees/commercial-vacancy-tax-cvt or contact the Tax Collector for assistance. If you wish to share information about a vacant property subject to the Commercial Vacancy Tax with the Tax Collector to assist with enforcement, visit https://sftreasurer.org/report-vacant-commercial-property B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED This dataset delineates parcels with “Taxable Commercial Space” - meaning parcels where one or more property owner(s) and/or commercial tenant(s) are required to file or pay the Commercial Vacancy Tax. The dataset includes the Block, Lot, Parcel Number and Situs Address for each commercial parcel within the named Districts. Information about each filing received for the parcel is included, such as Filer Type (Owner / Tenant), Filer Name, Situs Address from Filing, whether the filer reported a vacancy, and if so, the tax rate applied. The information displayed is reported by the taxpayers and subject to audit by the Tax Collector. C. UPDATE PROCESS Data will be refreshed daily until further notice. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET Filings that are reflected as Pending are under review by the Tax Collector. Reasons for review include: the filer reported that the parcel is not Taxable Commercial Space (ie the parcel does not have a structure, is not within the boundaries, does not otherwise meet the definition of Taxable Commercial Space), or the Parcel Number and Situs Addresses are not aligned. E. RELATED DATASETS
  • Registered business locations – San Francisco
  • San Francisco Property Information Map
  • Assessor Block Maps

columns.name: BLOCK
columns.description: The block portion of the parcel number broken out.

columns.name: LOT
columns.description: The lot portion of the parcel number broken out.

columns.name: ParcelNumber
columns.description: Block and Lot Number (Full Assessor Parcel Number)

columns.name: ParcelSitusAddress
columns.description: Address of parcel

columns.name: BAN
columns.description: Seven digit number assigned to registered business accounts

columns.name: LIN
columns.description: Location Identification Number. Each DBA has a unique LIN for location specific tax filings

columns.name: Filed
columns.description: Indicates whether a tax filing was received for the parcel; Yes indicates a filing was received; No indicates a filing was not received; Pending indicates that a filing is under review by the Tax Collector

columns.name: FilerType
columns.description: Type of filer: Owner/Tenant/Subtenant

columns.name: FilerName
columns.description: Name of tax filer

columns.name: SitusAddressfromFiling
columns.description: Situs address from tax filing

columns.name: Vacant
columns.description: Indicates whether the space is vacant.  Yes indicates that the space was reported as vacant in the tax filing  or did not file and was determined to be vacant by the Tax Collector.

columns.name: Rate
columns.description: The tax rate is per linear foot of Frontage

columns.name: TaxYear
columns.description: Tax Year of the tax filing or of the expected tax filing

columns.name: location
columns.description: Geometry point taken from centroid of parcel

columns.name: longitude
columns.description: Longitude of parcel centroid

columns.name: latitude
columns.description: Latitude of parcel centroid

columns.name: analysis_neighborhood
columns.description: Analysis neighborhood the parcel falls in

columns.name: supervisor_district
columns.description: Supervisor district the parcel falls in

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the record (row) was was last updated/ loaded into DataSF data portal

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Analysis Neighborhoods
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Analysis Neighborhoods' (ajp5-b2md) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Supervisor Districts
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Supervisor Districts' (26cr-cadq) the point in column 'location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
